docs.snippet: AFTER a dullish winter season, Israel is enjoying a rich musical summer. An international meeting of singers, a group of local festivals, and the visits of outstanding musical personalities have made this an interesting season.

docs.snippet: OF THE three women who dominated the hearts of men who at one time or another dominated portions of South America, Elisa Lynch was the most subtle, the most sophisticated and probably the most intelligent. She was most certainly the only Anglo-Saxon...
docs.lead_paragraph: OF THE three women who dominated the hearts of men who at one time or another dominated portions of South America, Elisa Lynch was the most subtle, the most sophisticated and probably the most intelligent. She was most certainly the only Anglo-Saxon ever to take on the job of riding at the side of a latino liberator or dictator. (In South America it was sometimes a bit difficult to tell which was which.)
docs.abstract: Barrett, W E: Woman on Horseback

headline.main: At a Strong Man's Side; WOMAN ON HORSEBACK: The Story of Francisco Lopez and Elisa Lynch. By William E. Barrett. 362 pp. New York: Doubleday & Co. $3.50.

docs.snippet: The foreign exchange market last.week continued in the pattern! .of its predecessors--rates moved narrowly on extremely dull markets. Absence of developments affecting the market was accounted the sole reason for its lethargy.

docs.snippet: New passenger ships for the route of the Moore-McCormack Lines from New York to the east coast of South America, which have been under discussion for some years, are approaching reality. Formal application for Government assistance in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: New passenger ships for the route of the Moore-McCormack Lines from New York to the east coast of South America, which have been under discussion for some years, are approaching reality. Formal application for Government assistance in the construction of the vessels is expected to be made soon.
docs.abstract: Moore-McCormack conf with Maritime Bd on bldg 2 passenger-cargo ships to replace 3 Good Neighbor Fleet liners on NY-S Amer route; expected to seek Govt subsidy; Admr Cochrane on proposed design

headline.main: 2 LINERS PLANNED FOR LATIN ROUTE; Moore-McCormack to Ask U.S. Aid in Building Vessels to Replace 3 Present Craft
